name: paymentInitiationRecipientGet
description: Get details about a payment recipient you have previously created.

PaymentInitiationRecipientGetRequest.description: PaymentInitiationRecipientGetRequest defines the request schema for `/payment_initiation/recipient/get`

APIClientID.description: Your Plaid API `client_id`. The `client_id` is required and may be provided either in the `PLAID-CLIENT-ID` header or as part of a request body.
APIClientID.title: ClientID

APISecret.description: Your Plaid API `secret`. The `secret` is required and may be provided either in the `PLAID-SECRET` header or as part of a request body.
APISecret.title: APISecret

$block: PaymentInitiationRecipient defines a payment initiation recipient

$ul: **address**: The optional address of the payment recipient. Required by most institutions outside of the UK.
**city**: The city where the recipient is located. Maximum of 35 characters.
**country**: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code where the recipient is located.
**postal_code**: The postal code where the recipient is located. Maximum of 16 characters.
**street**: An array of length 1-2 representing the street address where the recipient is located. Maximum of 70 characters.
**bacs**: An object containing a BACS account number and sort code. If an IBAN is not provided or if you need to accept domestic GBP-denominated payments, BACS data is required.
**account**: The account number of the account. Maximum of 10 characters.
**sort_code**: The 6-character sort code of the account.
**iban**: The International Bank Account Number (IBAN) for the recipient.
**request_id**: A unique identifier for the request, which can be used for troubleshooting. This identifier, like all Plaid identifiers, is case sensitive.
